{"id":488783462,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1620140791,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/488783462/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"27.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkPossibility(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int sum = 0;\n        int n = nums.size();        \n        for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){\n            if(nums[i] < nums[i - 1]){\n                sum++;\n                if(sum >1 ||(i-1>0 && i+1<n && nums[i+1] < nums[i-1] && nums[i] < nums[i-2])) {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
